subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Marathon Running
Running
lead_paragraph: Constantina Tomescu, 38, left the lead pack at about the midway point and won the women’s marathon, while a footrace between Kenya and China decided the silver.
snippet: Constantina Tomescu, 38, left the lead pack at about the midway point and won the women’s marathon, while a footrace between Kenya and China decided the silver.
